ExampleDefinition.Title: Band Series chart
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Generates a simple Band Series chart in code
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Band Series chart</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Generates a simple Band Series chart in code. The FastBandRenderableSeries requires an XyyDataSeries, which contains one X-point and two Y-points.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Dual lines are drawn by SeriesColor, Series1Color and shaded bands are drawn using BandUpColor and BandDownColor, depending on whether Y1 is greater than Y2.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Tip!</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic">If you have data where Y1 is greater than Y2 always, you'll get an envelope effect. Great for rendering confidence intervals, error margins or Bollinger Bands!</Run>
